text: Ni chichiŵichidwa chitabu (chamasengo gao), ni chinchaona akuleŵa ali ŵawoga ligongo lya yaili mwalakwemo, ni tachitiji: “Kutapana kwetuwe! Ana chele chitabuchi chanti uli! Changaleka (chindu) chamwana namuno chekulungwa ikaŵeje kuchikusanya (pakuchilemba ni manambala gakwe)!” Ni tachiisimana yosope yaŵapanganyisye ili iyiche (ni kuŵichidwa paujo pao). Soni Ambuje ŵenu ŵangantenda lupuso jwalijose
